name: Spider Climber (itch)
description:
Spider Climber
My spinoff of Spiderman's game for C64, wrote for the "Crazy Climber Challenge" into the Retro Programmers Inside facebook group.
How much high can you go? Avoid to touch obstacles with your hands, avoid the Goblin and avoid the fire that comes from the buttom if you are still!
Hint: want infinite energy? poke 21784,1 and sys 20480 :-)
